name: Cardston Alberta Temple

ordinance: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
session: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
summary: The Cardston Alberta Temple (formerly the Alberta Temple) is the eighth constructed and sixth of the still-operating temples of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Located in Cardston, Alberta, it is the church's oldest temple outside the United States.

name: Rome Italy Temple
email: Log in to send an email to the temple
ordinance: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
session: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
summary: The Rome Italy Temple is a three-story building where LDS Church members perform religious ordinances. It is on the site's east, atop the piazza with stone steps and fountains that lead down to the visitors' center on the opposite end.

name: Laie Hawaii Temple
email: Log in to send an email to the temple
ordinance: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
session: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
summary: The Laie Hawaii Temple was the fifth temple completed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints after the Mormon exodus to the Rocky Mountains. It was the first temple built outside the continental United States and the first built outside of Utah.

name: Idaho Falls Idaho Temple
email: Log in to send an email to the temple
ordinance: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
session: Please visit churchofjesuschrist.org to schedule an appointment.
summary: The Idaho Falls Idaho Temple (formerly the Idaho Falls Temple) is the tenth constructed and eighth operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Located in the city of Idaho Falls, Idaho, it was the church's first temple built in Idaho, and the first built with a modern single-spire design.
